modShortDescription: Adds a buildable / buyable auto turret that uses 7.62 HP ammo.
modDescription:
Adds a buildable / buyable auto turret that uses 7.62 HP ammo.

It has longer range and more damage than the vanilla game 9mm [auto turret](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-traps/), but within the parameters of the game as not to be overpowering.

Should be compatible with any other mods.

## Installation

Simply unzip into main … 7daystodie / Mods … folder as any other simple mod. If u have no Mods folder under main game directory, simply create one and unzip it there so it ends up like … <game folder> / Mods / <MyMod>

Enjoy!

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kgnJIviVCgFBztnKtN0i_4k4158Z260s/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** [Furious Angel](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/furious-angel/)
